name: Chicken Dip

instructionRequests.step: Put the cream cheese and hot sauce in a medium-sized saucepan over medium heat. As the cream cheese begins to melt, stir the cheese and hot sauce until combined

Once the cream cheese is fully melted, add the chicken and stir to coat the chicken in the sauce. Turn off the heat and stir in 3/4 cup of the mozzarella cheese. Add heavy cream to make it easier to stir
Transfer the mixture to an 8-inch round baking pan and layer the rest of the mozzarella.
Bake for 10 minutes, until the cheese is melted and bubbling.
Serve with celery sticks or Fathead Crackers

additionalInfo: This is another version of the KetoConnect recipe because their recipe was way to spicy for my taste. The dip is amazing! I mean, what could go wrong when you mix cream cheese, cheese and chicken, right?
